sentences.en: Any money due you will be sent by cheque through the post.
sentences.cn: 应该支付给你的款项将会以支票邮寄给你。

sentences.en: Drilling is due to start early next year.
sentences.cn: 钻探将于明年早些时候开工。

sentences.en: Errors may have been made due to human falli.
sentences.cn: 由于人难免犯错，错误可能已由此而生。

sentences.en: Filming was due to start next month.
sentences.cn: 电影定于下月开拍。

sentences.en: he had to withdraw due to a knee injury.
sentences.cn: 他因膝伤不得不退出。

sentences.en: He is due to face a court-martial on drugs charges.
sentences.cn: 他将因毒品交易的指控受到军法审判。

sentences.en: He refused to cut his hair due to his Rastafarian beliefs.
sentences.cn: 因为信奉拉斯塔法里教，他拒绝剪去头发。

sentences.en: His gift was an extremely kind gesture. Credit where credit's due.
sentences.cn: 他的礼物是很友好的表示，这值得称赞。

sentences.en: His new book is due to be published next year.
sentences.cn: 他的新书预计明年出版。

sentences.en: I reckon I'm due one of my travels.
sentences.cn: 我想我就要开始我的一次旅行了.

sentences.en: It was a real prize due to its rarity and good condition.
sentences.cn: 因为稀有并且品相完好，它价值连城。

sentences.en: My car is due for its MOT in two days' time.
sentences.cn: 我的车再有两天就该年检了。

sentences.en: Presidential elections are due to be held in ten days' time.
sentences.cn: 总统竞选将在10天后如期举行。

sentences.en: The cargo was due to be offloaded in Singapore three days later.
sentences.cn: 货物定于3天后在新加坡卸载。

sentences.en: The Channel tunnel was due to open towards the end of 1993.
sentences.cn: 海峡隧道预计1993年年底前开通。

sentences.en: The factory was due to shut for the festive period.
sentences.cn: 节日期间工厂将关门。

sentences.en: The next income tax payment is due on 31 January.
sentences.cn: 下一次的所得税支付期限是1月31日。

sentences.en: the range will be extended in due course.
sentences.cn: 在适当的时候范围将被扩大。

sentences.en: The team are due to fly to Italy next month.
sentences.cn: 该球队预定下个月飞往意大利。

sentences.en: They were due to pay the balance on delivery.
sentences.cn: 他们应该在货到时支付余额。

sentences.en: unemployment due to automation will grow steadily.
sentences.cn: 自动化导致的失业人数将不断增加。

sentences.en: Unfortunately, due to unforeseen circumstances, this year's show has been cancelled.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是，由于一些意外情况，今年的演出被取消了。

phrases.tran_cn: 待发；待退；应离店但还未离店

trans.tran_cn: 预期的，到期的，适当的，应有的
trans.tran_en: expected to happen or arrive at a particular time
directly to the north, south, east, or west
your due is what you deserve, or something it is your right to have
